Pedro Manuel Barata de Macedo Lima (20 Eprel 1971 20 June 2020) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri Portuguese-Angolan, na-apụta na telenovelas na mba Portugal
Ọ bụkwa onye na-egwu mmiri Olympic.
Ọ nọchitere anya Angola n'afọ 1988 na afọ1992 na Summer Olympics.
Lima sonyere n'ọtụtụ asọmpi igwu mmiri mana ọ nweghị mgbe ọ gara n'ihu na mbido
N'afọ 1988, a chụpụrụ ya na 50m freestyle nke ụmụ nwoke, ọ bụ onye nke 62 na 100m freest style nke ụmụ nwoke
N'afọ 1992, Lima mechara nke 43 na Men's 50m freestyle na nke 53 na Men''s 100m butterfly
Lima nwetakwara ihe nrite ọla edo na ọla nchara n'afọ 1991 All-Africa Games, ọ ritere ihe nrite ego edo na 50m freestyle nke ụmụ nwoke na ọla nchọcha na 100m butterfly nke ụmụ nwoke
Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2018, Lima nwere ihe ndekọ mba abụọ maka Angola ihe ndekọ 50m freestyle setịpụrụ n'afọ 1991 All-Africa Games nke 23.98 sekọnd na ihe ndekọ 100m azụ nke 59.30 sekọnd.

Mgbe a kpọrọ ya ka ọ kwado ihe ngosi TV banyere ihe nkiri a na-akpọ Magacine, ọ nwere ọrụ na ihe nkiri ncha Portuguese dịka O Último Beijo, Ninguém como Tu, Fala-me de Amor, Ilha dos Amores na A Outra
O mekwara ihe nkiri na 2009 Second Life
Lima bụ onye mmekọ nke ihe nlereanya Anna Westerlund, onye ya na ya nwere ụmụ anọ
O nwekwara nwa nwoke toro eto site na mmekọrịta ya na Patrícia Piloto.
N'abalị 20 ọnwa June afọ 2020, a chọtara ozu Lima na Abano Beach [pt] na Cascais, n'ihe yiri ka ọ bụ igbu onwe ya
A kọrọ na o zigara ozi ekele nye ndị enyi abụọ n'oge na-adịbeghị anya n'ụbọchị a.
